entry.title: Ordinals BIP PR
entry.summary: The email discusses the inclusion of Ordinals and Inscriptions in the Bitcoin ecosystem. The author acknowledges that while some people may perceive it as an improvement, their personal opinion on the matter is not mentioned. The author suggests that whether Ordinals deserve a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) is still up for debate, but forcing the proposer to retract it would not be a productive solution. Instead, if there are valid reasons why it should not be considered a BIP, those reasons should be presented during the formal process and the proposal should be officially rejected. On the other hand, if there are no such reasons, the proposal should follow the regular process and be accepted. The author emphasizes that leaving it in limbo and hoping it will go away is not a viable solution. The email concludes with a simple "Thanks" and the name of the sender, Ryan Breen.
